sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import Moment from 'react-moment' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {deleteLog} from '../../redux/actions/logActions' import {setCurrentLog} from '../../redux/actions/logActions' import {clearCurrentLog} from '../../redux/actions/logActions' import {updateLog} from '../../redux/actions/logActions' import M from 'materialize-css/dist/js/materialize' const LogItem = ({log,deleteLog,setCurrentLog,clearCurrentLog,updateLog}) => { const {id,message,tech,date} = log const handleDelete=()=>{ deleteLog(id) M.toast({html:`Log Deleted`}) } const handleUpdate=()=>{ updateLog(log) M.toast({html:`Log Updated`}) } return (
  • {message}
    ID #{id} last updated by {" "} {tech}
    on {" "} {date}     delete_forever
    • ) } LogItem.propTypes = { log: PropTypes.object.isRequired, deleteLog:PropTypes.func.isRequired, setCurr } export default connect(null,{deleteLog,clearCurrentLog,setCurrentLog,updateLog})(LogItem)
